title: Bug 32770: Java application launch shortcut error doesn't help user
description: Bug 32770: Java application launch shortcut error doesn't help the user. Also, we should improve the quality of the error message.
OB: When trying to launch a Java application using a shortcut, the error message displayed does not provide any helpful information to the user.
EB: The error message should provide a hint to the user about what they need to do to fix the problem. In this case, they need to select a resource. The message should say something like 'Launch failed: No file with a main type selected.'
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a Java application launch shortcut.
2. Attempt to launch the application using the shortcut.
3. Observe the error message and notice that it does not provide any useful information to the user.
